titleStmt.title: Englands warning-piece: shewing the nature, danger, and ill effects of civill-warre, and of those nations which have bin infested with it, described. Very necessary for these times wherein we are in so great feare and imminent danger of civill dissention. With a true relation of the miseries and distractions of Germany, France, Ireland, and Spaine. Also the sudden death of the Queen Mother of France. By Thomas Morton.
titleStmt.author: Morton, Thomas, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Author not to be confused with Thomas Morton, Bp. of Durham.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
